FuncDef: The display keychain command displays the configuration of the specified keychain. The display keychain command displays the configuration of the specified keychain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the keychain to be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the key-id of a particular keychain to be displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 63.

ExtraInfo: To locate or rectify a keychain authentication failure, or collect required information before configuration, you can run the display keychain command to view configurations of a specified keychain.
